execute(inputs, outputs) {
try {
var cmdout = JSON.parse(inputs.cmdout);
outputs.tx_id = cmdout.resp.transactionId; outputs.tx_hash = cmdout.resp.transactionHash; outputs.node_id = cmdout.resp.nodeId;
outputs.tx_status = cmdout.receipt.status; outputs.account_id = cmdout.receipt.accountId;
outputs.timestamp = cmdout.record.consensusTimestamp outputs.tx_fee = cmdout.record.transactionFee
outputs.result = "OK";
} catch (e) { outputs.result = "KO"; }
})(inputs, outputs);</value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="id=0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb"/> <sys_element_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <field>cmdout</field> <id>0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb</id> <sys_created_by>nicola.attico</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-02 13:33:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>dd013fe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f396191a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>nicola.attico</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 13:33:19</sys_updated_on> <table>var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb</table> <value>{{step[f14a6bb3-d06e-45e4-b506-f274f7d8fcdb].output}}</value> </sys_element_mapping> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_output_0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb^id=0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb"/> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple" query="table=var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7^id=0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb"/> <sys_hub_step_ext_input action="delete_multiple" query="model=0d01fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619eb^sys_idNOT IN4501fbe3db11c9902f5dfcd1f39619ef"/> <sys_hub_step_ext_input action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <array>false</array> <array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized> <attributes>element_mapping_provider=com.glide.flow_design.action.data.FlowDesignVariableMapper,uiType=string,uiTypeLabel=String</attributes> <audit>false</audit> <calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

<sys_updated_on>2022-02-02 12:33:37</sys_updated_on> <value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var cmd = './hcli account create'
if (inputs.key) { cmd = cmd + ' --key ' + inputs.key.getValue("public_key") } if (inputs.memo) { cmd = cmd + ' --memo ' + inputs.memo } if (inputs.receiver_signature_required) { cmd = cmd + ' --reqsig' }
if (inputs.sign_with) { while (inputs.sign_with.next()) { cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + inputs.sign_with.getValue("public_key") } }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> outputs.timestamp = cmdout.record.consensusTimestamp outputs.tx_fee = cmdout.record.transactionFee
outputs.result = "OK";
} catch (e) { outputs.result = "KO"; }

outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value> <variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable> </sys_variable_value> <sys_element_mapping action="delete_multiple"
